WorkItem.Description: The heuristic type match of Websense calls nerddinner.com an Advertisement.  Is there anything in the architecture of the application that would cause this?  Can't imagine that it's the domain name.
WorkItem.Summary: Websense blocks nerddinner.com under category Advertisement

Comments.Message: Hmmm, there's no reason it should block. Do you know how to report this as a valid site to them?
